channel.title: How long does it take to be verified for Spotify, iTunes?
channel.description: I put my info to be verified a few weeks ago for iTunes and Spotify so I can edit my profiles there, but no activity is happening... How long does it usually take for them to review and reply to your submission?

item.title: How long does it take to be verified for Spotify, iTunes?
item.dc:creator: DJC
item.description:
Same:(. I just redid it before I was verified with more links so that it would go faster.

Read full topic

item.source: How long does it take to be verified for Spotify, iTunes?

item.title: How long does it take to be verified for Spotify, iTunes?
item.dc:creator: anon6476606
item.description:
aUstin_Haga:

I know for Spotify if you link your sound cloud and your email, that email has to be somewhere within the links or in you bio on your SoundCloud account. If you do that, it should only take a few days.

do what he said

Read full topic
